description: Turnbull the star man in TOTW
title: Turnbull the star man in TOTW
title_page: Turnbull the star man in TOTW - BBC Sport
maintext:
The man of the moment, David Turnbull, and last season's player of the year, Kyogo Furuhashi both made Sportscene presenter, Jonathan Sutherland's team of the week following their performances against Ross County on Saturday.
The Scotland midfielder marked his return to the starting line-up with a brace, while the Japanese forward continued to dazzle Celtic Park with his magical movement up top.
